entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind south 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
